title: Hurricane Florence (September 2018)
description: Hurricane Florence wrecked havoc on the Carolinas. Use the A|B tool to see a before and after of the coast.

title: California Wildfires & British Columbia Wildfires (Summer 2018)
description: Explore the Larsen C Ice Shelf using different map projections, zoom levels and layers. Use the event tab to quickly acess other events.

title: Snow in Lesotho, South Africa (August 2018)
description: Snow in South Africa is a rare event. Use the zoom tool and percipitation layers to look at this event.

title: Saharan Dust Storms (2018)
description: Did you know dust from the African Sahara can travel across the ocean to North America? See for yourself!

title: Sinabung Volcano Eruption (February 2018)
description: Use carbon dioxide and sulfur layers to look at the Sinabung Volcano.

title: Hurricane Maria (September 2017)
description: Hurricane Maria devastated Puerto Rico. Follow the storm as it forms from a tropical depression to a category 4 hurricane.

title: Larsen C Ice Shelf / Iceberg A68A - July 2017
description: Explore the Larsen C Ice Shelf using different map projections, zoom levels and layers. Use the event tab to quickly acess other events.

title: Explore The Earth at Night (2012 - 2016)
description: Use various layers to explore regions of the earth at night!

title: Shrinking Aral Sea (2001 - 2018)
description: See how decades of water diversion, coupled with regional droughts, have caused the Aral Sea basic to dry out.
